title: Phase 0: Project Setup

title: Copy logo images

title: Verify blank page loads

title: Verify all assets accessible

title: Create main.js entry point

title: Create config.js with geometry constants
description: Export MASK config, HITBOX rectangles, TICKER params, PLAYLIST order. Single source of truth for all tunables.

title: Set background color #4425FC
description: Apply background: #4425FC to body. Verify rgb(68, 37, 252) in computed styles.

title: Load Ubuntu Sans Mono font
description: Google Fonts link or @font-face. Set font-family on body. Verify font loads correctly.

title: Set text color white
description: Apply color: #fff to body for default white text.

title: Disable scrollbars
description: overflow: hidden on html and body. Verify scrollWidth == clientWidth.

title: Documentation & Code Quality
description: JSDoc comments, README updates, inline documentation for complex logic. Code organization and maintainability.

title: Add JSDoc to config.js exports

title: Verify code formatting consistency
description: Consistent indentation, quotes, semicolons. Consider adding .editorconfig.

title: Add JSDoc to navigation functions
description: Document goToChannel, goToPrev, goToNext with params, return values, side effects.

title: Add JSDoc to state management
description: Document __PLAYER_STATE__ structure, when it updates, how to access.

title: Comment complex CSS calculations
description: Add comments explaining clip-path values, clamp calculations, z-index reasoning.

title: Create README with setup instructions
description: Document: how to run locally, how to run tests, how to deploy. Keep minimal.

title: Document test mode parameters
description: Document ?test=1, &debug=1, &marquee=run. What they do, when to use them.

title: Document config.js structure
description: Explain how to modify geometry without touching CSS. Config-driven architecture.

title: Add inline comments for tricky logic
description: Comment wraparound logic, preload strategy, focus gating. Aid future maintenance.

title: Create CHANGELOG
description: Track major changes, version history if needed. Keep lightweight.

title: Phase 6: Ticker Marquee
description: Implement persistent scrolling logo strip. Visible on all channels, ~24s loop, height clamped 28-56px. Small logo subset under 380px viewport.

title: Create ticker container element
description: Add div[data-ticker] inside .tv-screen. Absolute positioned at bottom of screen.

title: Set animation duration 24s
description: Animation duration ~24s for full loop. Expose via data-loop-seconds attribute.

title: Duplicate logos for seamless loop
description: Clone logo strip so animation loops seamlessly without gaps. Standard marquee technique.

title: Ensure ticker visible on all channels
description: Ticker must remain visible regardless of active channel (video or bio).

title: Verify ticker is decorative only
description: Ticker logos not wrapped in anchor tags. No click handlers. Purely decorative.

title: Verify no pause on hover
description: Ticker animation continues on hover. No :hover pause effect.

title: Test ticker at 320px viewport
description: Verify small logo set displays at 320px. Height clamped to min 28px.

title: Test ticker at 768px viewport
description: Verify full logo set displays. Height calculated correctly at this size.

title: Test ticker at 1920px viewport
description: Verify full logo set displays. Height clamped to max 56px.

title: Freeze ticker in test mode
description: In ?test=1 mode, freeze ticker at translateX=0 unless &marquee=run specified.

title: Add data-loop-seconds attribute
description: Expose loop duration for testing: data-loop-seconds='24' on ticker element.

title: Define TICKER config in config.js
description: Export TICKER: height (10%), minHeight (28px), maxHeight (56px), loopDuration (24s), bgColor (#000).

title: Calculate ticker content width
description: Calculate total width of logo strip for accurate animation distance.

title: Handle ticker resize
description: Recalculate on window resize. Update logo set if crossing 380px threshold.

title: Add ticker animation delay option
description: Config option to delay ticker start. Useful for initial load experience.

title: Style ticker with black background
description: Apply background: #000 to ticker. Verify rgb(0,0,0) in computed styles.

title: Implement ticker height clamping
description: Height = 10% of screen, clamped between 28px and 56px using clamp() or JS.

title: Create logo container for marquee
description: Add inner div to hold logo images. Will be animated for scroll effect.

title: Add full logo set images
description: Add img elements for: Pave, Hightouch, Hazel, Amera, Speakeasy, Portable. Visible >=380px.

title: Add small logo set images
description: Subset for <380px: Pave, Hightouch, Hazel, Portable. Hide Amera, Speakeasy.

title: Implement logo set switching
description: Detect viewport width, show full or small logo set. data-logo-set attribute.

title: Create CSS marquee animation
description: CSS @keyframes for infinite leftward scroll. translateX from 0 to -100% of content width.

title: Performance Optimization
description: Optimize asset loading, preload strategy, animation performance. Target 60fps on mobile devices.

title: Optimize video preload strategy
description: Only current+next video preloaded. Others have preload='none'. Monitor memory usage.

title: Add performance monitoring
description: Optional: add performance marks/measures for debugging. Remove in production.

title: Optimize font loading
description: font-display: swap for Ubuntu Sans Mono. Preload critical font weight.

title: Bundle size verification
description: Verify total JS/CSS size is minimal. No unused code. Consider inline critical CSS.

title: Lazy load bio images
description: Bio images only loaded when approaching their channel. loading='lazy' or JS lazy loading.

title: Optimize ticker animation performance
description: Use transform instead of left/margin. will-change hint. GPU acceleration.

title: Optimize CRT glitch animation
description: Use transform/opacity for glitch. Avoid layout thrashing. Short duration (180ms).

title: Minimize repaints on channel switch
description: Profile paint during navigation. Minimize DOM changes. Use visibility/opacity over display.

title: Defer non-critical JS
description: Ensure main.js is deferred. Critical rendering path unblocked.

title: Optimize image formats
description: Use WebP for logos/bios where supported. Fallback to PNG. Appropriate compression.

title: Compress video assets
description: Verify videos are appropriately compressed. Consider adaptive bitrate if needed.

title: Test performance on mobile
description: Profile on real mobile device. Target 60fps during animations. Check memory usage.

title: Phase 8: Test Mode + Playwright
description: Implement deterministic test mode (?test=1), debug overlay (?test=1&debug=1), expose window.__PLAYER_STATE__, and complete Playwright test suite.

description: Check URL for ?test=1 parameter. Set global isTestMode flag. Export for module use.

title: Draw hotspot outlines in debug

title: Hide debug overlay in production

title: Write test: navigation next

title: Write test: keyboard focus gating

title: Create window.__PLAYER_STATE__ object

title: Write test: DOWN hitbox click

title: Write test: screen click no-op
description: Playwright test: click screen center (not hitbox), verify no navigation.

title: Write test: video pause on leave

title: Write test: video resume on return

title: Write test: preload correctness

title: Write test: hotspot URL validation

title: Write test: ticker logo subset
description: Playwright test: at <380px, verify small logo set. At >=380px, verify full set.

title: Write test: CRT timing
description: Playwright test: verify data-crt-active toggles true then false within 150-220ms.

title: Write test: bezel not affected by CRT

title: Freeze marquee in test mode
description: In test mode, set ticker translateX=0. No animation. Unless &marquee=run specified.

title: Create visual regression baseline
description: Capture baseline screenshots at 320px, 768px, 1920px for each channel in test mode.

title: Set up visual regression comparison
description: Configure Playwright visual comparison with appropriate threshold for minor variations.

title: Configure CI/CD for Playwright
description: GitHub Actions workflow to run Playwright tests on PR. Fail on test failures.

title: Document test mode API
description: Document ?test=1, &debug=1, &marquee=run params. Document __PLAYER_STATE__ structure.

title: Write unit test: PLAYLIST constant
description: Test PLAYLIST has exactly 7 items in correct order.

title: Write unit test: MASK config values
description: Test MASK has all required properties with valid percentages.

title: Write unit test: HITBOX config values
description: Test HITBOX_UP and HITBOX_DOWN have valid rectangle definitions.

title: Write unit test: TICKER config values
description: Test TICKER config has all required properties with valid values.

title: Write unit test: HOTSPOTS config
description: Test all 3 bio hotspot configs exist with correct URL counts.

title: Write unit test: goToChannel bounds
description: Test goToChannel rejects invalid indices (negative, >6, non-integer).

title: Make CRT deterministic in test mode
description: In test mode, CRT effect should be predictable. No random variations.

title: Write unit test: wraparound math
description: Test circular index calculation for all edge cases.

title: Write unit test: focus gating logic
description: Unit test isInputFocused helper with various element types.

title: Write unit test: video time storage

title: Write unit test: preload array logic

description: Check URL for &debug=1 parameter. Set isDebugMode flag. Only active if test mode also enabled.

title: Write e2e test: ticker visibility
description: Navigate all channels, verify ticker visible on each.

title: Write visual test: bio channel mobile
description: Screenshot test for ira-ko.png at 375px.

description: Check config.js exports all required constants: MASK, HITBOX, TICKER, PLAYLIST, HOTSPOTS.

description: Verify config values correctly applied to DOM elements.

description: Add hidden div for debug overlays. Only visible in debug mode. z-index above all content.

title: Draw screen mask outline in debug
description: Debug mode: show dotted outline of clip-path mask area. Visual verification.

title: Draw ticker bounds in debug
description: Debug mode: show outline of ticker container bounds. Height verification.

description: Debug mode: show UP and DOWN hitbox rectangles. Click area verification.

title: Apply hitbox positioning from config
description: Position hitbox buttons using config values. Use percentages for responsive sizing.

description: Verify UP and DOWN hitbox rectangles never intersect at any viewport size.

description: Object to store playback times: { 0: 12.5, 1: 0, ... }. Persists during session.

title: Update data-active-index on navigation
description: Update #tvPlayer data-active-index attribute when channel changes.

title: Update data-active-asset on navigation
description: Update #tvPlayer data-active-asset attribute to current asset filename.

title: Expose preloadedAssets in state

title: Test full navigation cycle

title: Implement goToChannel function

title: Test wraparound prev from 0

description: Start at channel 6, press right/down, verify shows channel 0.

title: Test hitbox clicks

title: Test video time persistence
description: Play video to 5s, navigate away, return, verify resumes near 5s.

title: Verify screen click does nothing
description: Click inside TV screen (not on hitbox), verify no channel change occurs.

title: Debounce rapid navigation
description: Optional debounce to prevent accidental double-navigation. ~100ms threshold.

title: Add navigation event dispatching
description: Dispatch custom 'channelchange' event on navigation for extensibility.

title: Log navigation actions

title: Test touch events on hitboxes

description: Listen for keydown on document. Handle ArrowLeft (prev) and ArrowRight (next).

title: Implement focus gating for keyboard

title: Create UP hitbox button

title: Create DOWN hitbox button

title: Define HITBOX rectangles in config.js
description: Export HITBOX_UP and HITBOX_DOWN with top, left, width, height percentages.

title: Test CRT timing in test mode

title: Create CRT scanline effect
description: Optional subtle scanline overlay for CRT authenticity. CSS only.

title: Add CRT color fringing
description: Optional RGB channel offset effect during glitch. Subtle, not jarring.

title: Create CRT noise texture
description: Optional static noise overlay during glitch. CSS/SVG based.

title: Add easing to channel transitions
description: Smooth opacity/transform easing for content swap. Not abrupt.

title: Tune CRT glitch timing
description: Fine-tune animation keyframes for optimal visual effect.

title: Define CRT timing constants
description: Add CRT config: duration (180ms), timing function. Target 150-220ms range.

title: Create CRT glitch CSS animation
description: CSS @keyframes for flicker effect. Opacity/brightness/contrast variations. Subtle, not jarring.

description: Listen for error event on videos. Log, hide element, show placeholder or skip to next.

title: Handle image load errors
description: Listen for error event on images. Log, show placeholder or fallback background.
